channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: RIP, ‘Dead Space’….Again (2008-2023)
item.description: Unless EA decides to sell off the 'Dead Space' IP to someone else, the sci-fi horror series has died a second death.

item.title: X cuts off the European Commission’s ad account after being fined €120 million
item.description: Friday, the EU slapped X with a €120 million fine (about $140 million) for violating the Digital Services Act (DSA). It was the first time that a company had been hit with a penalty for running afoul of the law. Elon Musk responded with his trademark tact and professionalism by posting “Bullshit” on X in […]

item.title: Netflix co-CEO reportedly discussed Warner Bros. deal with Trump
item.description: Will Netflix’s $82.7 billion deal to acquire Warner Bros. get approval from federal regulators? While Paramount was assumed to be the frontrunner to acquire the storied movie studio thanks to CEO David Ellison’s connections to the Trump administration, new reporting in Bloomberg and The Hollywood Reporter suggests that Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos met with President […]...

item.title: The Lord of the Rings trilogy returns to theaters in January for 25th anniversary
item.description: One does not simply spend more than 11 hours watching The Lord of the Rings trilogy in a single weekend at home when the opportunity to do so in theaters arises. As The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring turns 25, Fathom Entertainment and Warner Bros. announced theatrical screenings of the Peter Jackson trilogy in their extended editions, according to an exclusive report from Variety. The re-releases will be available in DBOX presentations from January 16 to 19, complete with movements and vibrations to make you feel like you're making the journey to Mordor with Frodo and his entou...

item.title: Looking for a Breville espresso machine? I'm a certified barista, and these are my 3 top recommendations
item.description: If you're shopping for a Breville espresso machine, these are the three I think deserve a place on your kitchen counter.

item.title: Best Buy's holiday weekend sale ends today - Black Friday prices on TVs, AirPods, laptops and more
item.description: Best Buy has a massive holiday weekend sale, and I'm rounding up today's 17 best deals featuring Black Friday prices on TVs, laptops, iPads, headphones, and more.

item.title: Skeet Ulrich Reveals the ‘Scream’ Reboots’ Original Endgame
item.description: The former Billy Loomis speaks out on what his repeat hauntings would've led to in a different version of 'Scream 7.'

item.title: X deactivates European Commission’s ad account after the company was fined €120M
item.description: X has seemingly penalized the European Commission's account after the commission fined the company over blue checkmarks and ad transparency.

item.title: Test de la Reolink Duo 3 WiFi : la surveillance connectée en panoramique et en 8K
item.description: Une caméra de surveillance connectée capable de capturer une image à 180° et en 16 Mpx, c’est une promesse alléchante. En effet, un tel champ de vision en qualité 8K est une chose rare et peut faire une réelle différence… sur le papier. Ce que nous nous sommes empressés de vérifier.
